name: The Ballads of Reemus 2 - 2D Point and Click Adventure Game
blurb: The next chapter in the Reemus series. A classic, Lucas Arts inspired 2D point and click comedy adventure game for PC/Mac/Linux.

rewards.reward: Fancy HD desktop wallpaper and I'll whisper a silent "thank you" to you in my head when I go to bed tonight.
$11.59 USD - EARLY BIRD GETS THE GAME ABOUT WORMS - A digital download of the final game for your choice of PC, Mac or Linux + Download of both Reemus Soundtracks.
$14.52 USD - GET THE GAME - A digital download of the final game for your choice of PC, Mac or Linux.
$24.22 USD - GET THE GAME, SOUNDTRACK AND BETA TEST - A digital download of game (includes YOUR NAME in the Thank You Credits) + Become a BETA Tester + Download of both Reemus Soundtracks.

$33.90 USD - NAME AN NPC CHARACTER - Those characters milling in the background, going about their daily business. Help them step out of obscurity and bless them with a name of their own. Also includes Game Download + BETA Tester + Soundtracks. ** Name must be in good taste and not violate any copyrights.

$43.59 USD - MAKE AN NPC TALK  - Name an NPC character AND give them a one sentence (140 characters MAX) line of dialogue. The character will say this line anytime the player talks to them. Also includes Game Download + BETA Tester + Soundtracks. ** Name and Dialogue must be in good taste and not violate any copyrights.

$53.18 USD - AUTOGRAPHED COLLECTOR'S EDITION  - A DVD hard copy in a case, personally autographed. Also includes Game Download + BETA Tester  + Soundtracks. ** Name and dialogue must be in good taste and not violate any copyrights.

$62.66 USD - COLLECTOR'S EDITION & CHARACTER - A DVD hard copy in a case, personally autographed. PLUS Name an NPC character AND give them a one sentence (140 characters MAX) line of dialogue. The character will say this line anytime the player talks to them. Also includes Game Download + BETA Tester + Soundtracks. ** Name and dialogue must be in good taste and not violate any copyrights.

$94.99 USD - CREATE AN INVENTORY ITEM -  Create and name your own inventory item in the game. Your item will be usable for all other players and may even end up in a puzzle solution! Also includes Game Download + BETA Tester  + Soundtracks. ** Name must be in good taste and not violate any copyrights.

$115.68  USD - COLLECTOR'S & INVENTORY ITEM - A DVD hard copy in a jewel case, personally autographed. PLUS create and name your own inventory item in the game. Your item will be usable for all other players and may even end up in a puzzle solution! Also includes Game Download + BETA Tester  + Soundtracks. ** Name must be in good taste and not violate any copyrights.

TOO MANY KICKSTARTERS! AKA THE BOB TIER: For anyone looking to give massive support without the fear of adding more games to your collection or trinkets to your shelf. This is a strictly "Thank you" tier. I promise to send you nothing in return, only my gratitude. You get to sleep at night knowing you've helped fund a new game but without the guilt of getting a game you'll never play.

$237.48 USD - BECOME A CHARACTER - Send a picture and I'll create a character with your likeness. Give your character a name and become part of Reemus lore. Also includes Game Download + BETA Tester  + Soundtracks. ** Name must be in good taste and not violate any copyrights.

$260.28 USD - COLLECTOR'S & YOU AS A CHARACTER - A DVD hard copy in a jewel case, personally autographed. PLUS Send a picture and I'll create a character with your likeness. Give your character a name and become part of Reemus lore. Also includes Game Download + BETA Tester  + Soundtracks. ** Name must be in good taste and not violate any copyrights.

$474.97 USD - CREATE YOUR OWN QUEST - Create and name an NPC with your likeness, give your NPC a line of dialogue and create and name your own Inventory items. With your character and items create a small sidequest for Reemus & Liam to embark on. The quest will be in the form of "Use X on Y to get Z" from there I will connect the quest into the game and may tinker with a few details but the XYZ is all yours to create! Also includes Game Download + BETA Tester  + Soundtracks. ** Name and dialogue must be in good taste and not violate any copyrights.

$501.28 USD - COLLECTOR'S & YOUR QUEST - A DVD hard copy in a jewel case, personally autographed. PLUS Create and name an NPC with your likeness, give your NPC a line of dialogue and create and name your own Inventory items. With your character and items create a small sidequest for Reemus & Liam to embark on. The quest will be in the form of "Use X on Y to get Z" from there I will connect the quest into the game and may tinker with a few details but the XYZ is all yours to create! Also includes Game Download + BETA Tester  + Soundtracks. ** Name and dialogue must be in good taste and not violate any copyrights.

$968.71 USD - CREATE YOUR OWN BALLAD - Write your own 4 line poem that I will turn into a ballad and have one of the in-game bards sing. I will professionally record the song and give you a digital MP3 copy to have as well. Also includes Game Download + Autographed Collector's Edition (shipping included) + BETA Tester  + Soundtracks. ** Name and song must be in good taste and not violate any copyrights.

$1452.99 USD - BECOME A BARD - Create and name your own NPC with your likeness, write your own 4 line poem that I will record as a real song. Your Bard NPC will sing the song whenever someone clicks.   I'll also send you a digital MP3 copy to have. Also includes Game Download + Autographed Collector's Edition (shipping included) + BETA Tester  + Soundtracks. ** Name and song must be in good taste and not violate any copyrights.\r\n***If you have the ability to record our own voice, you can sing the song yourself and I'll set it to music.

$2421.66 USD - ROCK ME LIAM - Liam the bear will write a heroic ballad about your life and sing it. You supply the details of your life you want included in the song, I will professionally record it and send it to you in MP3 format. Liam will perform the song as an Easter Egg in the game. Have your exploits immortalized in song forever! Also includes Game Download + Autographed Collector's Edition (shipping included) + BETA Tester  + Soundtracks. ** lyrical content must be in good taste and not violate any copyrights.
